defaults.noValue: Namespace not available in the selected clusters

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", clusterName=~"$cluster_name", container!="", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace)
sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", clusterName="$cluster_name", container!="", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace)

sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", clusterName=~"$cluster_name", container!="", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace) / sum(namespace_memory:kube_pod_container_resource_requests:sum{clusterName="$cluster_name", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace)

sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", clusterName="$cluster_name", container!="", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace) / sum(namespace_memory:kube_pod_container_resource_limits:sum{clusterName="$cluster_name", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace)

(
  sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace=~"$namespace"})))
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace=~"$namespace"})))
)
sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace=~"$namespace"})))

sum by (clusterName)(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace=~"$namespace"})
  -
  sum by (clusterName)(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace=~"$namespace"})

panels.title: Persistent volume claims used space per namespace

targets.expr: sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", container!="", clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", container!="", clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", container!="", clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", container!="", clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", container!="", clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", container!="", clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", container!="", clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", container!="", clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Rate of TCP Retransmits out of all sent segments
Rate of TCP SYN Retransmits out of all retransmits

list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster_name
